snippet: The Bulldogs continued their mischief against major programs with a game-winning shot in overtime by Alex Barlow, who went to Butler only to learn how to coach.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Butler upsets No. 1 Indiana, 88-86, at the Crossroads Classic in Indianapolis for their first victory over a top-ranked team; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Bulldogs continued their mischief against major programs with a game-winning shot in overtime by Alex Barlow, who went to Butler only to learn how to coach.

headline.seo: A Butler Walk-On Topples No. 1 Indiana
headline.main: A Butler Walk-On Topples No. 1 Indiana
headline.print_headline: A Butler Walk-On Topples No. 1 Indiana
